title: Cassiopeia is struggling and could use some buffs.
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:69}} is currently sitting at a 48%-49% win rate:
http://na.op.gg/champion/cassiopeia/statistics/mid
http://champion.gg/champion/Cassiopeia/Middle?

Buffs:

Q: Noxious Blast

Bonus movement speed increased from 30/35/40/45/50% to 50/55/60/65/70%

W: Miasma

Slow increased from 40/50/60/70/80% to 80% all ranks

replies.body: How is a 48 to 49% win rate a bad place?

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BAATsOBp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-21T02:02:26.695+0000)
>
> How is a 48 to 49% win rate a bad place?

Because people think a champion needs to have a winrate of at least 52% to be viable. Naturally, most people are dumb.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BAATsOBp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-21T02:10:24.518+0000)
>
> Because people think a champion needs to have a winrate of at least 52% to be viable. Naturally, most people are dumb.

yea,that's right but in the opposite sense

have you ever tried to lane vs a cassiopeia?

she spams manaless Q (50 mana while she have mana sustain and sustain is a joke) with 3.5 sec CD and if she hits you once if you are not dead you have to recall
sure she gets OOM if she spams E on you (before her first back) but if you have 100HP left it doesn't matter,then she needs to ~~last hit~~ cast her E on a dying minion it doesn't matter if it doesn't kill him and her mana is back,so unless she doesn't start spamming her E on minons she wont ever run OOM
ah and if you want to outpush her,she wont lose minons due her AA E last hit

damn if they  really  buff her early i'd bann her 100% of my games
Lmao wtf she’s fine in her state u probably are having bad games with her or you’re trash

Can she have a better reworked passive now? It feels absolutely useless in a 15-20 min game where everyone else seemingly gets like 400+ms and she at 366( close to there) at lvl 11 ~~(but then you won't get jokes about there's a snake in my boot)~~ " oh but all you have to do is land your q, w, or ult" and if you miss them? you deserve to die, it's a  snake eat snake world. Besides she's locked into not buying buffed sorc shoes ;c, but the expensive alternatives, while being slowish for like the  first half of game
